member.name: T:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection
member.summary:
Base class used by a control that wants to act as a client to connect to the server.
This class will hold a reference to the client and the server objects used for the connection. Inherited classes will handle extra information like the Exposable data or the ACE server object reference. The goal is that a tool will use this class and its properties and events to become a "dynamic" tool.
To avoid creating multiple server and client objects when it's not needed, this class will also handle sharing of the client connection between multiple instances of this class. This means: - when the base form is created in the designer, the client and server objects are provided by the designer - at run time, the base form will create a new client - when a tool is added to a form, it inherits the connection parameters from the base form it belongs to (automatic mode) or it has its own connection parameters (manual mode) - when a connection property is changed, every tool that uses it must be informed
Requires that the Ace.exe.config file be modified to enable remote access: - Set the RemotingPort value to the port number on which ACE should listen for connections, such as "12543" (default is "0", which disables remote access). - Set the RemotingName value to the name by which the ACE instance should respond (default is "ace").

member.name: T:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum
member.summary:
This enum is used to define the kind of host control this connection is used by.
It will let us define which kind of connection we are using. Based on this, we will hook/unhook to events, create client/server object, dispose of them...

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeUnknown
member.summary: Initial state

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeFormInDesigner
member.summary: The control is a form hosted by a designer

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeFormStandAlone
member.summary: The control is a stand-alone form (ie not in a designer)

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeFormStandAloneWithACEClient
member.summary: The control is a stand-alone form (ie not in a designer) with its own client

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeFormStandAloneInApplicationDomain
member.summary: The control is a stand-alone form (ie not in a designer) running in an application domain of the ACE client

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeFormForConditional
member.summary: The control is a form, and the connection is used in a conditional so we will directly use the connection of the host control which is a form

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeToolAutomatic
member.summary: The control is a tool with automatic connection parameters

member.name: F:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.ControlTypeEnum.ControlTypeToolManual
member.summary:
The control is a tool with manual connection parameters
This is not used for the moment, tool are always in Automatic mode.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnection.UpdateRemoting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the remoting. This method will be called: - when a property of this object gets changed, if we do not inherit the connection properties from the base form - when a property of the connection object of the parent form gets changed, if we inherit the connection properties from the base form
member.param: if set to true [raise on update control event].

member.name: E:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.BeforeUpdateRemoting
member.summary:
An event raised when remoting will be updated.
We will use it to momentary stop polling in each client connection that are using us.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.OnBeforeUpdateRemoting
member.summary: Called before updating the remoting.

member.name: E:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.AfterUpdateRemoting
member.summary:
An event raised when remoting has been updated.
We will use it to re-start polling in each client connection that are using us.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.OnAfterUpdateRemoting
member.summary: Called after updating the remoting.

member.name: P:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.AceObject
member.summary:
Gets or sets the ACE object associated with the control.
This property is only used by the property editor of the UI Builder designer, it is not serialized.

member.name: P:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.AceObjectFullPath
member.summary:
Gets or sets the ACE object full path associated with the control.
This property is only used by the C# script generator.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.#ctor(System.Windows.Forms.Control)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.ClientConnectionAceObject_RootCollectionChanged(System.Object,Ace.Core.Server.Event.ContentsChangeEventArgs)
member.summary:
Handles the RootCollectionChanged event of the ClientConnectionAceObject control.
When the ACE object used in this connection is removed from the Workspace, we need to update the state of our connection. Note that when an object is renamed in the Workspace, it is first removed then added. So we will really detect that the object will be or is disposed.
member.param: The instance containing the event data.

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.UpdateRemoting(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Update the remoting. This method will be called: - when a property of this object gets changed, if we do not inherit the connection properties from the base form - when a property of the connection object of the parent form gets changed, if we inherit the connection properties from the base form
member.param: if set to true [raise on update control event].

member.name: M:Ace.UIBuilder.Client.Controls.ClientConnectionAceObject.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
